Question
========
  
An educational psychologist wants to know if reading aloud at home has an effect on children's school performance. Families are randomly assigned to three conditions: no reading aloud, 30 minutes of reading aloud every day, or 60 minutes of reading aloud every day. The study will be conducted on two groups of children: children aged 4-5, and children aged 6-7. What analysis technique is appropriate to examine whether reading aloud has an effect on school performance, statistically controlled for age group? 
Answerlist
----------
* One-way ANOVA
* Two-way ANOVA
* Three-way ANOVA
* ANCOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
